revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Poni Meadow |image = [[File:Poni Meadow.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Poni Meadow. |tokens = 1,225,000 |location = North of Poni Plains. }}
<!--T:2--> '''Poni Meadow''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 16,659,968 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !!
